main event: Three unidentified flying objects were observed in Garden City, New York on July 10, 1954, exhibiting irregular and erratic flight patterns.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 20 seconds, with the objects climbing and descending at steep angles., The objects were described as regular aircraft, about 40 feet long, and aluminum in color., They exhibited faster speeds than jets and erratic flight movement., The observer noted the objects emitted no sound during the sighting., The report included comments that the objects did not resemble any conventional aircraft.
witness description: The witness reported seeing the objects alone in the vicinity while commuting to work.
